original_title: Pantera - Cemetery Gates - Live at Hollywood Palladium
overview: Band: Pantera  Date: 1992.06.27  Location: Hollywood, CA  Venue: Palladium  Time: 1h02m49s  This is one BADASS Pantera show.  Everyone is on their game (especially Phil) and the performance is just incredible.  The set list is killer and it was just really a great time for this band IMO.
title: Pantera - Cemetery Gates - Live at Hollywood Palladium
